channel.title: Content on My English
channel.description: Recent content in Content on My English

item.description: check list grammar example try 1형식 The dog sleeps on the sofa. Disasters take place everywhere every time. 2형식 - 상태 He is a firefighter. I’m sometimes scared of the clap of thunder. 2형식 - 변화 Paul became the president. Now the virus became a huge and massive disaster we never been experienced before. 2형식 - 감각 This cookie tastes good.

check list grammar example try 1형식 The dog sleeps on the sofa . I got up early this morning even there weren’t any responsibilities that belonged to me. 2형식 - 상태 He is a firefighter. I was totally free since I was alone. 2형식 - 변화 Paul became the president. I became single only for today or some days more If my family doesn’t come back soon.

item.title: 027 - Birth Rate In South Korea
item.description: 템플릿 grammar example try 1형식 The dog sleeps on the sofa . 2형식 - 상태 He is a firefighter. 2형식 - 변화 Paul became the president. 2형식 - 감각 This cookie tastes good. 3형식 I watched a movie with Anna. 4형식 My mother bought me a shirt. 5형식 - (명사/형용사) Her friends call her “Little Susie.

item.title: 글쓰기 템플릿
item.description: grammar example try 1형식 The dog sleeps on the sofa . 2형식 - 상태 He is a firefighter. 2형식 - 변화 Paul became the president. 2형식 - 감각 This cookie tastes good. 3형식 I watched a movie with Anna. 4형식 My mother bought me a shirt. 5형식 - (명사/형용사) Her friends call her “Little Susie.

I’ve never had dreamed to become a police officer before. But some events made me challenge becoming a police officer. When I made my mind, the plan of the state examination to the police officer this year was not yet opened until that time. Even though having no information, I could assume what I’m needed with the recruitment notice from maritime police which had been anounced in advance. According to the announcement, I was not qualified because I did not have the certificate of Engineer Information Processing(EIP) required.
